entry.title: Strawberry Waffles
entry.summary:
Author: lushescape

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 50,486Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 892

Summary: “Like a date?” You ask in a near whisper. Jason looks like he's been electrocuted but slowly he nods his head twice. “Yeah. A date. You and me, the school dance.” Oh. Your heart feels like it's beating so fast it's going to stop at any second. But you nod, your face warm, and there's no way you can stop yourself from smiling now. “Um, y- yeah.” You stammer before clearing your throat softly. “Yes.” You say, more confident in your answer. “Yes, I would.. love to go with you. On a date. To the dance.” Or Jason Todd becomes a girl dad after dying and coming back to life

entry.title: Red Hood, Green Heart
entry.summary:
Author: Persadol

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 155,136Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 233

Summary: Jason Todd has died before-and he hasn't quite come back whole. Haunted by shadows of his past and the weight of justice in Gotham, he finds comfort only in silence and the static crackle of Alfred's voice in his comms. That is, until the night a portal rips open above him and a very unexpected visitor-blue-skinned, horned, and definitely not from this world-crashes straight into his life. Literally. You're a druid from the forests of the Forgotten Realms, on a peaceful path of healing and harmony… until a bandit ambush and a wild spell gone wrong land you flat on top of a masked stranger in a dark, alien city. Jason doesn't do magic. You don't do guns. But somehow, between Gotham rooftops and druidic spells, trauma and trust, gunfire and green growth-you might just change each other's worlds.

entry.title: Threads of Red
entry.summary:
Author: ddottodd

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,621Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 15

Summary: She’s the girl Gotham calls the “smiling, always positive nurse.” He’s the brooding vigilante in red, moving through the city’s shadows.When disaster strikes their worlds collide, he rescues, she heals. She tends to the frightened and injured, he fights to keep them alive.Two very different kinds of heroism. Two very different kinds of people. And somewhere between smoke, sirens, and the chaos of Gotham, something unspoken begins to grow.Can the girl who gives hope to everyone she meets reach the boy who trusts no one?

entry.title: Apartment 3B
entry.summary:
Author: ElaineInABox

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 64,811Chapters: 18/20Kudos: 851

Summary: You weren’t looking for love, just somewhere cheap, quiet, and safe enough to get you through the semester. Jason Todd wasn’t looking for company, just a roommate who wouldn’t ask questions about why he came home at two AM bloody and bruised.But in a cramped apartment in Crime Alley, between burnt coffee, leaky ceilings, and the soft hum of the city that never sleeps, the silence between you starts to change. What begins as survival becomes something quieter, steadier—something that almost feels like home.

entry.title: promise me this
entry.summary:
Author: emerald_lotus

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,355Chapters: 3/7Kudos: 53

Summary: Jason has succumbed to the classic trap: falling in love with his best friend. After a childhood on the streets of Gotham together and an incredibly fucked up life, he only falls deeper and harder until it's time to finally do something. But life keeps getting in the way and he has to decide what he’s willing to give up to be with her.

entry.title: Loving Machine
entry.summary:
Author: Spenc56623

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,646Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 23

Summary: After a long night of work, getting home and finally relaxing, the one and only Red Hood falls into your apartment. Thinking it is his safe house, he is confused why you're here but when you notice him bleeding, your nurse instincts take over. Ignoring your fear, you patch him up. He leaves with A promise, threat, or warning, maybe even all three, that he will be back at some point in time.

entry.title: Dream High School Experience
entry.summary:
Author: storyofsoul

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,373Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 6

Summary: Life in Gotham sucks. The streets are dirty, Arkham prisoners break out every other week, and your local orphanage gets burned to a crisp by Batman’s “rehabilitable” rogues at least once a month. But hey, at least the apartments are dirt cheap and you just got a pass to go to the most elite school in the city, courtesy of Bruce Wayne himself. Everyone is in 10th grade.Tags will be updated as more chapters come out. These are a base so I know what to add.

entry.title: Working for the Knife
entry.summary:
Author: Vivid_vi

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,753Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 8

Summary: You've spent the better half of your life working as Talia al Ghul's handmaiden. You kept her secrets, and generally stayed in the shadows, not wanting much to do with The League's more complicated business. However, you've experienced a bit of a career shift since her son, Damian al Ghul Wayne, was born. Now, you find yourself looking after the infant boy, trying desperately to keep the heir to an ancient world-dominating organization safe from the relentless forces of evil. And no matter how much of a proficient you may be at looking after an unruly baby like Damian, it seems the universe doesn't want to give you a break.Jason Todd has decided to stay with The League of Assassins since emerging from the Lazuras Pit half-mad. Training under Ra's al Ghul seemed to be the easy bit. Now, he was meant to help you raise Bruce Wayne's son while The Joker ran wildly about, practically begging for him to kill him. And if things couldn't get any worse, he swore you were temping him to cross boundaries he promised himself he wouldn't.
